name: Slow Cooker Cilantro Lime Chicken
author: ltlmsmfft
summary: This is a nice change from plain chicken tacos.  The cilantro really adds a burst of flavor to this recipe.
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package dry taco seasoning mix
3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: Place the salsa,  , lime juice, and cilantro into a slow cooker, and stir to combine
Add the chicken breasts, and stir to coat with the salsa mixture
Cover the cooker, set to High, and cook until the chicken is very tender, about 4 hours
If desired, set cooker to Low and cook 6 to 8 hours
Shred chicken with 2 forks to serve
